{{Dialogue a-b-a|Jorah Mormont|I had no money and an expensive wife.|Daenerys Targaryen|And where is she now?|In another place, with another man.|Jorah Mormont mentions the whereabouts of his estranged wife|Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things}}
'''Tregar Ormollen''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones]]'', indirectly mentioned in "[[Cripples, Bastards and Broken Things]]". He is a [[Lys]]ene merchant lord. [[Lynesse Hightower]], the estranged wife of [[Jorah Mormont]], is his concubine.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Tregar Ormollen's backstory is the same. He shares his manse in Lys with Lynesse Hightower, one of his many concubines.''
